list_definition.definition: a regular sound, especially that of a watch, clock etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: the steady tick of the clock.

list_definition.definition: to make a sound like this
a mark ( ) used to show that something is correct, has been noted etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: If the answer is ‘yes’, put a tick in the box.

list_definition.definition: (often with off) to put this mark beside an item or name on a list etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She ticked everything off on the list.

list_definition.definition: a type of small, blood-sucking insect
